name: Meltdown Madness - 21/22 - Team 10
description:
21/22 Y1D - Team 10

A game developed by Critical Mass, designed for a BUas first year project. In this 2v2 couch co-op game you play as a sloth working in a nuclear powerplant. By redirecting a jet of water to your teams nuclear reactor you gain more points for the company and can become sloths of the month.

Developers:

Visual ArtistsDesigners ProgrammersKetlin Riks Denise Bruin Alex Vreeland Manon de Jong Finn Slutter Jesper Enschede Natália Feketová Sabina Barbu Matěj Kaločai Sanne van Rijswijck Tom Baas Stefan Pijnacker Eline Nijhuis Briana Prejoianu

Controls:

The game only supports Xbox controllers or controllers that windows recognize natively. 

A : Pick up / build

X : Throw

Bumper left : rotate counter-clockwise

Bumper right : rotate clockwise

Left thumbstick : walking 

Start/special right : Spawn new player

Select/special left : Change build mode
